title: COJI-COJI
overview: COJI-COJI is an animation series of 100 episodes and 1 special one, in which a uni-sex fairy tale-like character COJI-COJI, living in a fairy tale land, encounters various events. COJI-COJI goes to a school in the land, which tells it and Its friends how to use magic. But most of the time, the show focuses on its unique characteristics, not caring anything but enjoying its life in the land. Other kids except Johnny are not human beings but imaginary characters or something using animals as a motif.
